org.activebpel.work
Class AeWorkManager.AeWaitForAll

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.work.AeWorkManager.AeWaitForAll
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeWorkDoneListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeWorkManager.AeWaitForAny
Enclosing class:
AeWorkManager
protected class AeWorkManager.AeWaitForAll
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeWorkDoneListener

Waits for one or all of the work items within its collection to finish before calling its notify() method which will notify the calling thread from either waitForAll or waitForAny.

Field Summary
protected  java.util.Collection mColl
          set of work items we're waiting to complete
 
Constructor Summary
AeWorkManager.AeWaitForAll(java.util.Collection aColl)
          Creates a waiter that will notify its waiting objects when the WorkItems in its set have completed.
 
Method Summary
 void checkIfDone()
          Notifies the waiting objects if our notification criteria is met.
private  java.util.Collection copyWorkItems(java.util.Collection aWorkItems)
          We want to work off of a copy of the work items collections which would normally be a single call to clone(), but the collection passed in may contain objects other than WorkItems and these need to be skipped.
 void doWait(long aTimeout)
          If the waiting is not done then we'll go into a wait
protected  int getCompleteCount()
          Returns the number of completed items within the collection
protected  boolean isDone()
          returns true if the criteria for waiting has been met and we no longer need to wait.

private java.util.Collection copyWorkItems(java.util.Collection aWorkItems)
We want to work off of a copy of the work items collections which would normally be a single call to clone(), but the collection passed in may contain objects other than WorkItems and these need to be skipped.

checkIfDone

public void checkIfDone()
Notifies the waiting objects if our notification criteria is met. We're either waiting for all objects to complete or waiting for any in the collection to complete.

isDone

returns true if the criteria for waiting has been met and we no longer need to wait.
